Project configuration, is the act to configuring a project configuration for url*Builds. Project configurations related to a vxconVisualStudioSolutionsProjects 0 Solutions
vxconBuildConfigurations 0 Build Configurations . EiffelEnvision splits project configuration's into two factions: Common Properties and Configuration Properties.
Project build configurations can be added, removed and edited through the vxurfConfigurationManagerDialogBoxS 0 Configuration Manager dialog box.

To configure a project's properties select the project in the vxurfSolutionExplorerDialog 0 Solution Explorer , or the vxurfClassViewWindow 0 Class View , and then select Project, Properties from the main menu.
